title: Online Math Leveling Program for Engineering Freshmen

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A hybrid program for engineering freshmen featuring a three-stage online math competency diagnostic test (placement, initial assessment, institutional evaluation), combining digital-device-based self-directed learning with faculty feedback

learning_goals: Students complete a three-level diagnostic assessment of basic math competencies via an online platform within two weeks
Over 80% of students establish personalized learning roadmaps based on diagnostic results
Link over 70% of assessment results to project-based tasks to improve practical application skills
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
